Articles.Content: I (stupidly) updated to 1.5 without making a copy of the game or my save files and found many problems. Long story short I now have a reverted 1.4.5 game back and I also put back all the mods. When I click on the saved game it says the save file is incompatible with the current version. I was hoping there was some way to fix this.

The only thing you can try is to open up your .sfs file in a text editor and change the version number on the third line from 1.5.0 to 1.4.5.  Hopefully 1.5.0 didn't change anything else that 1.4.5 can't understand.

You can also check and see if your save folder has a Backup folder inside it with backups that are still 1.4.5.
